name: Transformer_Grid_to_AC
description: Steps down 33 kV to 415 V from the utility grid.

name: Transformer_Battery_AC
description: Connects 800 V battery inverters to 415 V AC bus.

name: Transformer_Hydro_Step_Up
description: Steps up voltage from hydro turbine to 11 kV for transmission.

name: Transformer_Hydro_Step_Down
description: Steps down voltage from 11 kV to 415 V for load connection.

name: Transformer_Load_Isolation
description: Isolates the load from the AC bus for protection and stability.
